TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: And by the way, this will hardly be a surprise. I'm sure the first thing they'll do when they arrive at the office will be to check this forum to see if it's in orbit already. You're discussing this in the most active thread in the whole forum.

And by the way, this will hardly be a surprise. I'm sure the first thing they'll do when they arrive at the office will be to check this forum to see if it's in orbit already. You're discussing this in the most active thread in the whole forum.

A nice gesture is a nice gesture, surprise or not.
Hey I just hit up Miguel Pina on Twitter and he said that is indeed their address. I say go for it (for delivery in about 2 hours @ 12:30 local time).
I've emailed to run the idea by them (after all, we don't know if they have regular lunch plans etc). The last thing we want is to bug the team, I'm sure.
what if the devs do not like pizza ever thought of this
Hey guys I just hit up Maxmaps (miguel) and he confirmed that is indeed their address.

but the pizzas will be for the whole company or only for the KSP related? remember that only a part of the company works on KSP, the rest works in marketing i think

Id label it "to the Kerbal Space Program Team" that way there should be no confusion. Squad is a good company as a whole from what I've read on them, but i cant buy that many pizzas
Wait guys, we could just drive the Hypetrain to their office!

Id label it "to the Kerbal Space Program Team" that way there should be no confusion. Squad is a good company as a whole from what I've read on them, but i cant buy that many pizzas

Speaking of which, 4 or 5 pizzas isn't a ton of money, but we should still spread the costs out. I can reimburse whoever orders after the fact.

Id label it "to the Kerbal Space Program Team" that way there should be no confusion. Squad is a good company as a whole from what I've read on them, but i cant buy that many pizzas

if you have paypal account, we could help you with the cost
If Squad are open to the idea, I would happily assist and reimburse
Max just confirmed that is their address on Twitter.

Hey, Ive been stalking this thread for a while. I often read but dont ever post. (Check My profile. Been a member for a while with 0 posts)

Just to point out, its a great Idea the pizza thing, but in order to spread costs, would someone be willing to sort something out like Paypal donations to the cause?

You could even order multiple orders from the same place or different takeaways.

Just a thought by the way as to help with the too many pizzas cost too much problem.

*Hanging in the back of the HypeTrain btw since departure.

Side note. Your all awesome but also b******s!!! Im meant to be working but keep getting distracted with UBER comments making me laugh and smile.

Edit: Ninja'd

If Squad are open to the idea, I would happily assist and reimburse

ditto!

10chars
Likewise if whoever buys has a paypal I'll chip in some
Sent a PM over to Maxmaps to confirm address.
Great idea about the pizza. The ingredients should be sugar,pepper,lots of cafeine and ofcourse a large dosis of extra HYPE!

Now we wait...

Maybe...

Probably not...

Great idea about the pizza. The ingredients should be sugar,pepper,lots of cafeine and ofcourse a large dosis of extra HYPE!

speaking of caffeine, great idea to maybe send a couple of 2-liters if available as well
if the pm has no effect, i can call to the offices, just tell me what you want to ask

ok so cost being spread out between the community it becomes a non issue, save for the logistics of an accurate dispersal of the cost, we still need to find out how many pizzas and where there going to get to the KSP team, or squad overall, ill admit im kinda dumb when it comes to things like this. though we could get a KSP pizza fund paypal style going and give the devs the account info, have them change passwords and stuff. and we just donate to that. and if they dont feel like pizza (for the fact that if we do something like this, that account would reach the scale of Wackjob computer fund levels) they can treat them selves somewhere else. this would equate to a more convinient solution on all parties i think.

2-liters

Wayyyy more coffee than that!

if the pm has no effect, i can call to the offices, just tell me what you want to ask

Just ask if the majority of the KSP development team works there in that office. If they say no, ask where they work.
Alright, I've got Steam open and ready to update. My hypetrain derailed two days ago, so I'm gonna go mow the yard while I wait ...
Just now on twitter from MaxMaps in regards to if a pizza would be okay: "it would be universally approved insanity."
